name: speech-ai-transcribe
description: A powerful browser-based tool for converting spoken language into written text using advanced speech recognition technology.

scripts.generate-types: npx -p typescript tsc src/*[^index].js --declaration --allowJs --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir src/types && node ./scripts/bundle-types.js and rm -rf src/types
scripts.build: npm run copy-fft.js && npm run generate-types && npm run wasm:build && npm run wasm:copy && npm run pack:transcriber and npm run pack:loud

author: Oleksandr Lebedyev <aresobus@gmail.com>
